pullrequest.title: adding Model::CreateJoint method that actually adds the joint to Model::joints member variable.

content.raw:
both works, I am not sure which one is the right one.  I thought maybe casting from Entity might be closer to Model than Base class is. But I am not sure.

Looking back, there are both dynamic and static point casting from `shared_from_this()`, the new member function uses static casting, any idea which one is better?
content.html:
both works, I am not sure which one is the right one. I thought maybe casting from Entity might be closer to Model than Base class is. But I am not sure.

Looking back, there are both dynamic and static point casting from shared_from_this(), the new member function uses static casting, any idea which one is better?
